diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Bartonella endocarditis, Ehrlichia chaffeensis infection, Rickettsia rickettsii infection, other infectious endocarditis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient exhibited a broad range of serological cross-reactivity with antibodies to Coxiella burnetii and Bartonella species. The serological confirmation of high levels of antibodies against C. burnetii phases I and II, along with negative cultures, and the clinical manifestations supporting the diagnosis of Q fever endocarditis led to the final diagnosis.
